title: Magic weapons

properties.name: description
properties.value: Magic is an attack type that is used primarily by weapons like staves and wands. In contrast to most melee weapons, magic weapons can be used to deal damage to non-adjacent opponents up. Magic weapons are associated with the Magic combat skill. They can be divided into items that can autocast combat spells from specific spellbooks, and weapons with built-in spells that are typically charged with runes and various tokens.

content:
Magic is an attack type that is used primarily by weapons like staves and wands. In contrast to most melee weapons, magic weapons can be used to deal damage to non-adjacent opponents up. Magic weapons are associated with the Magic combat skill. They can be divided into items that can autocast combat spells from specific spellbooks, and weapons with built-in spells that are typically charged with runes and various tokens.

Contents

  • 1 Weapons
    • 1.1 Weapons with built-in spells
      • 1.1.1 Powered staves
    • 1.2 Weapons with autocasting
      • 1.2.1 Bladed staves
      • 1.2.2 Staves
    • 1.3 Secondary
      • 1.3.1 Salamanders
  • 2 Best Magic attack bonus
  • 3 Best Magic defence bonus
  • 4 See also

Weapons[edit | edit source]

Weapons with built-in spells[edit | edit source]

The following weapon types offer only magic-based attacks using a built-in spell.

Powered staves[edit | edit source]

Weapons with autocasting[edit | edit source]

The following weapon types provide the option to autocast various combat spells from specific spellbooks in addition to several melee attack styles.

Secondary[edit | edit source]

The following weapon types have at least one magic-based attack style.

Category: SalamanderCombat StyleStyle typeWeapon StyleExperienceInvisible Boost

Best Magic attack bonus[edit | edit source]

Slot Image Item Magic
bonus 		Notes
Ancestral hat +8 Requires 75 and 65 to wear, and gives +2% Magic damage. The 3rd age mage hat provides the same accuracy bonus and only requires 65 and 30 to wear, but has no Melee Defence or Magic damage bonuses.
3rd age amulet +15 Requires 65 and 30 to wear.
Ancestral robe top +35 Requires 75 and 65 to wear, and gives +2% Magic damage.
Ancestral robe bottom +26 Requires 75 and 65 to wear, and gives +2% Magic damage.
Eternal boots +8 Requires 75 and 75 to wear.
Imbued god cape +15 Requires 75 and completion of Mage Arena II miniquest to be worn, and gives +2% Magic damage.
Arcane spirit shield +20 Requires 65 , 75 , and 70 to be worn.
Tormented bracelet +10 Requires 75 to wear, and gives +5% Magic damage.
Seers ring (i) +12 The seers ring initially gives +6 Magic bonus. However, players can imbue their ring via Soul Wars or the Nightmare Zone to double the ring's bonuses to +12.
Kodai wand +28 Requires 75 to wield, and gives +15% Magic damage.
TOTAL +177

Ring of suffering (i) +20 The ring of suffering initially gives +10 Defence bonus. However, players can imbue their ring via Soul Wars or the Nightmare Zone to double the ring's bonuses to +20. Requires 75 to wear.
Kodai wand +20 Requires 75 to wield.
